title: Brookline (9/1) 2 BR - 2 BA - 1 Parking, Heat, Elect and HW Inc - 9/1
posting_body: Beautiful 2BR condo with 2 full bathrooms to rent in the heart of Washington Square, Brookline at 1600 Beacon St. Rent includes one indoor parking spot, Heat, Electric and Hot Water included.
This 956 square foot condo is available to rent beginning 9/1.
The luxury condo features a modern kitchen with hardwood floors, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.
It includes a newly renovated master bathroom and a master bedroom with custom California Closets.
Large windows with a city view make this bright condo even more beautiful.
Amenities include central air conditioning, concierge, community patio with grills, laundry, gym, storage space and bike racks.
Building is located directly across from the C line Washington Sq.
T stop, along the world-famous marathon route.
It is steps away from many of the best restaurants outside of downtown Boston.
It s a 10 minute walk to Coolidge Corner.
Easy access to the Longwood medical area, Fenway, BU, Harvard and BC!
